tool_description: An API that shows all actively signed UFC fighters for each individual weightclass.
name: UFC Roster API
title: UFC Roster API

api_list.name: Get All Fighters
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all active UFC fighters for each weight class
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-roster-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc-roster-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ufc-roster-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufc-roster-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
